name: photobot

scripts-info.start:bot: Launch the bot daemon in dev mode
scripts-info.start:api: Launch the backend API in dev mode
scripts-info.start:
Run the builded code under dist/npm/src/index.js
	(make sure you have a build first with yarn run build:npm)
scripts-info.build:npm: Builds the transpiled npm package under dist/npm
scripts-info.ppp: Increases the version patch number, push to github and publish to npm
scripts-info.mpp: Increases the version minor number, push to github and publish to npm

scripts.publish:npm: npm run build:npm && npm publish dist/npm
scripts.ppp: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm
scripts.mpp: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm run publish:npm

description: A Telegram bot that receives photo attachments from users and store them on a different server.
author: Fabricio C Zuardi
